solution_line_template: Since Governor Sandoval gave {sandoval_addresses} commencement addresses, twice the number that Governor Hawkins gave, Governor Hawkins gave {sandoval_addresses}/{hawkins_divisor} = <<{sandoval_addresses}/{hawkins_divisor}={hawkins_addresses}>>{hawkins_addresses} commencement addresses.
The two of them gave {hawkins_addresses}+{sandoval_addresses} = <<{hawkins_addresses}+{sandoval_addresses}={sandoval_and_hawkins_total}>>{sandoval_and_hawkins_total} commencement addresses in total.

Governor Sloan gave {sloan_additional_addresses} more commencement addresses than Governor Sandoval, a total of {sandoval_addresses}+{sloan_additional_addresses} = <<{sandoval_addresses}+{sloan_additional_addresses}={sloan_addresses}>>{sloan_addresses} commencement addresses.
The three of them gave {sloan_addresses}+{sandoval_and_hawkins_total} = <<{sloan_addresses}+{sandoval_and_hawkins_total}={total_addresses}>>{total_addresses} commencement addresses.
